text:
RETURN FROM VIETNAM

Cpl Michael N Fitzpatrick arrived last Wednesday to spend a 25 day leave with his parents, Mr. and Mrs. Neil Fitzpatrick and family after serving the past year in Vietnam.

Mr. and Mrs. Kenneth Boyd received word that their son CPO Larry Boyd had arrived home to Oxnard, Calif., after serving 7 months at Vietnam, aboard the carrier, USS Bon Homme Richard.
